name: park-well
description: api implementation for a car parking management app

scripts.test:cover: NODE_ENV=test nyc --reporter=text-lcov mocha --config .mocharc.js models/**/*.test.js src/**/**/*.test.js | coveralls
scripts.test:dev: yarn clean:test && NODE_ENV=test nyc mocha --config .mocharc.js models/**/*.test.js src/**/**/*test.js --watch
scripts.clean: yarn drop:db && yarn create:db && yarn migrate:db && yarn seed:db
scripts.clean:ci: NODE_ENV=test yarn create:db && NODE_ENV=test yarn migrate:db && NODE_ENV=test yarn seed:db
scripts.clean:test: NODE_ENV=test yarn drop:db && NODE_ENV=test yarn create:db && NODE_ENV=test yarn migrate:db && NODE_ENV=test yarn seed:db

author: KaiserPhemi <oluwafemi.akinwa@andela.com>
